programme.desc: Topik ini membincangkan tentang bahaya syirik yang boleh berlaku melalui percakapan, perbuatan dan iktikad dengan dalil serta kesan syirik dalam kehidupan.

programme.title: TVP@TTV Pend. Islam Tahun 4 Ep04
programme.desc: Topik ini membincangkan tentang pengertian tetamu serta menerangkan tuntutan hadis berkaitan dengan adab-adab memuliakan tetamu.

programme.title: Zoom UPSR Ep09
programme.desc: Saksikan aksi pelajar SK USJ 12 & SK Seksyen 9 Shah Alam menjawab soalan kuiz berpandukan sukatan pelajaran UPSR untuk mara ke pusingan seterusnya. Bersama artis jemputan Eric & Zhafir Muzani

programme.title: TTV UPSR MATEMATIK Ep02
programme.desc: Membincangkan topik Nombor Bulat (Pertukaran). Penerangan bagi kaedah menjawab, tip-tip penting dan formula. Murid-murid boleh memahami soalan subjektif dengan penerangan jawapan yang betul.

programme.title: UPSR Matematik Ep01
programme.desc: Bersedia menghadapi peperiksaan UPSR bersama Tutor TV! Cikgu Alif akan membantu anda dengan ulangkaji subjek Matematik serta membincangkan topik-topik peperiksaan, strategi menjawab soalan UPSR.

programme.title: Misi Studi UPSR Matematik Ep04
programme.desc: Masa dan Waktu.Menyatakan masa dalam sistem 12 dan 24 jam serta penyelesaian masalah.

programme.title: Misi Studi UPSR Matematik Ep05
programme.desc: Panjang, Jisim dan Isi Padu Cecair.Penukaran unit panjang, jisim dan isi padu. Pembacaan pembaris, penimbang dan silinder penyukat.

programme.title: Misi Studi UPSR Matematik Ep06
programme.desc: Ruang.Luas, perimeter 2D dan isi padu bentuk 3D serta penyelesaian masalah ruang.

programme.title: TTV UPSR MATEMATIK Ep03
programme.desc: Membincangkan topik Nombor Bulat. Topik ini dibahagi kepada Cerakinan nombor, urutan menaik, urutan menurun, tambah dan tolak. Penerangan tentang kaedah menjawab, tip-tip penting dan formula.

programme.title: UPSR - Chinese(C) Ep07
programme.desc: Do UPSR Chinese revision more effectively with tips and answering techniques from Teacher Eddie.

programme.title: UPSR Neram - Tamil Ep07
programme.desc: Pupils are introduced to types of sentences namely simple, compound and complex sentences. As such pupils are given key words which will help them to build sentences of such nature.

programme.title: TVP@TTV Pend. Islam Tahun 2 Ep04
programme.desc: Topik ini mengupas tentang pengertian sahabat, menyenaraikan beberapa orang sahabat Nabi yang terdiri daripada kalangan lelaki, perempuan, hamba dan kanak-kanak.

programme.title: TVP@TTV Pend. Islam Tahun 2 Ep05

programme.desc: For 13 years, a murderer goes on killing sprees while dressed as Santa. This year, the police tracked his next target to a small village in the north, where a group of friends are having a reunion.

programme.desc: A woman, who loses her entire family to a sociopath, enlists four people in need of organ transplants to help her carry out her vendetta.

programme.desc: The story of a group of friends who set out to make their first low-budget horror movie.

programme.title: The House of 72 Tenants
programme.desc: This fascinating, humorous box office smash captures a cross-section of Hong Kong society and their issues -- all crammed into a single tenement building.

programme.title: The Fastest Sword
programme.desc: From writer director Pan Lei comes this Chinese variation of Henry King's famous 1950's film about a persecuted swordsman.

programme.title: Brave Archer and His Mate
programme.desc: Fourth in the hugely popular series, the leader of 'Venom', supported by his fellow members and Brave Archer associates, sets out to defeat a mass murderer.

programme.title: That Man in Chang-an
programme.desc: Yan Jun stars in this romantic Han dynasty adventure epic as a dying emperor alongside an evil queen, amidst plots and counterplots galore!

programme.title: Shaolin Abbot
programme.desc: Alongside the equally famous Lo Lieh, superstar David Chiang plays noble warrior monk Chih Shim, the monk who saved the Southern Shaolin Temple.

programme.title: Fast Fingers
programme.desc: Hsu Hsia, a great kung fu actor himself, both directs and leads a team of four martial arts choreographers in his hilarious tale of 'kung fu pickpockets.'

programme.title: The Delightful Forest
programme.desc: A grateful convict becomes his prison officer's defender after he learns that the officer's restaurant has been taken over by a local thug.

programme.title: The Kingdom and the Beauty
programme.desc: Catch superstar, Linda Lin Dai, in one of her most acclaimed roles in this story of forbidden love between a country maiden and the emperor.

programme.title: The Sword and the Lute
programme.desc: Kwei Wu and his partner go on a mission to destroy the Phoenix Lute, a deadly weapon that shoots poisonous needles and can only be destroyed by the Kan sword.

programme.title: That Fiery Girl
programme.desc: Death and destruction are the order of the day after a bandit's daughter learns some painful truths about her past.

programme.title: Vengeance
programme.desc: In this award-winning Chang Cheh film, David Chiang plays a psychotic who stops at nothing to avenge his elder brother's death.

programme.title: Apartment for Ladies
programme.desc: This comedy centres on the residents of a females-only apartment who hail from different backgrounds and make money in varied ways.

programme.title: Pursuit of Vengeance
programme.desc: This fantastic tale of the fastest swordsman in the world is explosive as he takes on the '1000 Face Devil' and no less than seven murderers.

programme.title: Killers on Wheels
programme.desc: While taking a ferry on the way to a vacation, Kwok and his family meet a road thug who puts an ugly spin on their holiday plans.

programme.title: The Tigress of Shaolin
programme.desc: Hui Ying-hung co-stars with Liu Chia-yung in this fast-paced comedy that features the outrageous Leprosy Boxing style.

programme.title: The Condemned
programme.desc: A righteous man who can't fight and an unjustly wronged swordsman team up to battle against evil.

programme.title: Hell Has No Boundary
programme.desc: When a detective's bullet changes direction in mid-air to zero in on its target, a terrifying supernatural connection comes to light.

programme.title: The King Boxer
programme.desc: This drama captures the legend of a young boxer who battles the odds to become the ultimate fighter in a tournament against his greatest rivals.

programme.title: The Butterfly Chalice
programme.desc: Starring teenage heartthrob Pat Ting Hung, this film marks the directing debut of the kung-fu film genre's most respected figure, Chang Cheh.

programme.title: The Shadow Whip
programme.desc: Various people are out to get the Shadow Whip (an individual, not just a weapon). Starring Cheng Pei Pei and Yueh Hua.

programme.title: The Lady Professional
programme.desc: Lily Ho stars in this movie as a revenge seeking gun-for-hire who always gets her man in more ways than one!

programme.title: Clan of the White Lotus
programme.desc: A hero (Gordon Liu Chia hui) must learn 'Embroidery Fist' and acupuncture to counter a villain's (Lo Lieh) deadly fight techniques.

programme.title: The Happy Trio
programme.desc: Following the lives of three downtrodden, but resilient outcasts, John Lo Mar's gritty social drama paints a sense of realism rarely seen in Hong Kong movies.

programme.title: Vengeance Is a Golden Blade
programme.desc: In this tale of greed, lust and vengeance, only Silver Swallow can stop the golden blade.

programme.title: The Singing Killer
programme.desc: A singer is blackmailed into committing a heist but when he finds his first love working in the store which he's supposed to rob.

programme.title: Shaolin Martial Arts
programme.desc: When the Emperor employs Manchu boxers to eradicate the Shao Lin martial artists, see how two escapees begin a quest to restore the reputation of Shao Lin.

programme.title: The Flying Guillotine
programme.desc: A hero (Chen Kuan Tai) battles assassins who use a deadly, beheading weapon to kill dissidents.

programme.title: Woman of the Night
programme.desc: This three-film anthology collectively offers up a captivating examination of human obsession and love.

programme.title: Infernal Affairs
programme.desc: Andy Lau and Eric Tsang star in this thriller about a mole in the police department and an undercover cop, both of whom go all out to expose each other.

programme.title: Napping Kid
programme.desc: Soon after an important financial document is stolen from the computer of analyst Siu-yu, her boss receives an email demanding a relatively small ransom. Is this just the tip of an iceberg?

programme.title: All's Well, End's Well 2012
programme.desc: This beloved slapstick comedy series continues with four men on a heroic mission to help four women and wind up experiencing a series of mishaps.

programme.title: Aberdeen
programme.desc: This drama depicts how we try to right past wrongs, only to find that those we believe we hurt sometimes have completely different perceptions of the event.

programme.title: A Better Tomorrow
programme.desc: John Woo took his place as one of Hong Kong's premiere action directors with this slick action classic that immortalized Chow Yun Fat, Ti Lung & Leslie Cheung.

programme.title: Men on the Dragon
programme.desc: When four employees decide to sign up for their company's new Dragon Boat team, a life-changing challenge waits up ahead.

programme.title: Legally Declared Dead
programme.desc: An insurance agent who finds his clients' son dead in their bathroom begins to suspect that the parents may have something to hide.

programme.title: Manhunt
programme.desc: Director John Woo gathers Chinese, Japanese & Korean superstars - Zhang Han Yu, Masaharu Fukuyama & Ha Ji Won - in this remake of the classic crime thriller.

programme.title: Kidnap Ding Ding Don
programme.desc: 2015 HKFA Best Supporting Actress & Best New Performer Ivana Wong pairs up with Alex Fong, who plays an amnesiac kidnapper falling for his hostage.

programme.title: Mad World
programme.desc: This award-winning film is based on the true story of a bipolar man who is placed in the custody of his truck-driver father after being released from a mental hospital.

programme.title: Kung Fu Yoga
programme.desc: Jackie Chan's highest box office masterpiece! This one billion global box office hit depicts an archeology professor and his team in search of a lost ancient Indian treasure.

programme.title: Dad I'm Sorry
programme.desc: In this Vietnamese box office legend, Ba Sang lives in a poor district in Saigon and his son Woan is a Youtuber earning considerable income. A clash begins when their minds cannot meet.

programme.title: House of Flying Daggers
programme.desc: As the Tang Dynasty declines, several rebel groups are established, with the largest being the House of Flying Daggers. Two officers are ordered to kill the elusive leader of the group.

programme.title: A Wedding Invitation
programme.desc: A girl, who turns down a marriage proposal from her suitor, enters into a contract with him stating that they will reunite in five years - should they both still be single.

programme.title: Mr & Mrs Incredible
programme.desc: Bored with their mundane country lifestyle, a retired superhero couple sets out to make a comeback at the upcoming Martial World Assembly.

programme.title: The Incredible Monk, Dragon Return
programme.desc: Ji Gong forms an alliance with people from all walks of life to save humanity. Battle-hardened General Gao dare not marry his childhood sweetheart and turns to Ji Gong for help but things go awry.

programme.title: Love Contractually
programme.desc: In this romantic comedy, Sammi Cheng plays a beautiful CEO who decides to "borrow" sperm from a man to have her own child. This is also her first collaboration with Joseph Cheng.

programme.title: Concerto of the Bully
programme.desc: Starring Ronald Cheng, Cherry Ngan, Chrissie Chau, this drama is elevated by the chemistry between the leads - a kidnapped songwriter with an exceptional memory, and a street punk calmed by her music.

programme.title: Mrs K
programme.desc: Kara Hui makes her action film swansong by portraying a woman who will stop at nothing to protect her husband and daughter when enemies from her past resurface. Simon Yam & Wu Bai co-star.

programme.title: I Still Remember
programme.desc: An uplifting sports drama focusing on a property agent who leads an aimless, unfulfilling life & his P.E teacher, as they seek to find purpose in their lives.

programme.title: Murderer
programme.desc: A self-assured chief inspector begins to second-guess himself after a fainting spell damages his short-term memory - and indicates he may be a serial killer.

programme.title: Dearest Anita
programme.desc: This heartfelt movie is based on items from famed HK superstar Anita Mui's estate. Watch fans strive to return small gifts, handwritten cards & letters to their original senders.

programme.title: Fleet of Time
programme.desc: Years after Chen Xun is done with school, he follows his heart & his memories on a quest to reconnect with the girl he once loved as a schoolboy

programme.title: As the Light Goes Out
programme.desc: When a liquor warehouse fire threatens to plunge the whole of Hong Kong into darkness upon reaching a nearby power plant, can firefighters avert this disaster?

programme.title: Golden Chicken 2
programme.desc: The sequel to Golden Chicken is set in 2046 when an 82-year-old Ah Kam stops a heartbroken young man from taking memory loss pills & help ease his pain.
After Mo Wan lost his true love, he is numb to other women. One day, he writes a story titled '2046', about a room that never changes, where people go to find their lost memories.

programme.desc: The town hall is leaking and needs a new roof, and Paddington must stay silent to raise the money. // Will the strange radio messages Jonathan is receiving mean visitors are arriving from another world?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S1 Ep118
programme.desc: Mr. Gruber has been loaned a T-Rex Skeleton, but Lucky the dog has stolen and buried it! // The kids decide to form a rock band with Paddington, but what instrument should he play, and what is rock music?

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S2 Ep213
programme.desc: Blaze, AJ, and Gabby join Pegwheel the Pirate-Truck for an island treasure hunt! Following their treasure map, the friends search jungle beaches and mountains to find where X marks the spot.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S2 Ep214
programme.desc: Crusher's Grammy is in town to watch Crusher and Blaze race at the Monster Dome. But when Crusher tries to cheat using rocket skis, his plan backfires, blasting him off the racetrack and across Axle City!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S1 Ep109
programme.desc: When Bonnie Bones steals a chest of pirate treasures, Santiago learns just how much he needs his crew. // Santi and crew navigate Banana Island to save a baby monkey and its treasure from Enrique.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show S1 Ep106
programme.desc: Baby and friends set out to climb Wish Mountain and make a wish on the legendary shooting starfish, Ol' Sea Breeze.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S5 Ep509
programme.desc: When Nonny, Gil and Zooli conjure a genie, she agrees to grant whoever brings her the most precious gift a wish. They think it might be a precious gem, but turns out it's friendship!

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S3 Ep323
programme.desc: Fall is here! Molly and Gil can't wait to pick pumpkins, but someone has stolen all their pumpkins! Their turkey friend Giblet leads them on a hunt to find the culprits: the pumpkin patch pirates!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep119
programme.desc: Peppa loses her shoes, but she gets new red ones. Now she is so happy in them, that she refuses to take them off.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep120
programme.desc: Peppa and her family go to the school fair, and do lots of stuff while they're there. Peppa and her friends get their faces painted as tigers.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep121
programme.desc: It is Mummy Pig's birthday, and Peppa, George and Daddy Pig are planning a surprise.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep122
programme.desc: Peppa loses her tooth, so she puts the tooth under the pillow for the Tooth Fairy, but she worries that she might be mean.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep123
programme.desc: The family car breaks down, so Peppa and her family rent a new one, but it starts acting crazy

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep118
programme.desc: The barbababies prepare a show for Barbamama's birthday. While Barbalala finishes up, they go to the carnival where Barbabeau gets stuck in an attraction.

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep120
programme.desc: Barbalib, Barbalala and Barbabelle take turns as narrators to tell a story, each one bringing a very personal touch to it.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S1 Ep109
programme.desc: It's a music filled day at the Blue's Clues house as we try to figure out what song Blue wants to sing. On the way, we identify sounds of musical instruments and help chicks from the farm with their song.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S1 Ep111
programme.desc: When Crusher accidentally turns the baker truck's bots to messy mode, they sprout wheels and drive away! It's up to AJ and Blaze to track down the robots before Axle City is blanketed in baked goods.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S5 Ep504
programme.desc: Corny escapes from Farmer Al's Farm during a blackout, the pups must light their way home! // Uncle Otis is hurling down Jake's Mountain in a mine car! Ryder and the Pups must rescue him before it crashes.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S5 Ep505
programme.desc: Daring Danny X does a new stunt! He is harnessed over a canyon eating an Extreme Lunch but the wind flips him over! // It's Pie Swap Day! Humdinger makes Rocky Kitty steal a pie from Mr. Porter's to join.

programme.title: Deer Squad S1 Ep109
programme.desc: Professor Scratch's Switcheroo device causes chaos when Sir Steel uses it to get Deer Squad's Powers.

programme.title: Calvin & Kaison's Play Power S1 Ep111
programme.desc: Calvin's remote control car has been turbo charged and is out of control! Can Calvin summon his PLAY POWER before the kid cave is totally destroyed?

programme.title: Calvin & Kaison's Play Power S1 Ep112
programme.desc: ROBO G's robot flock are loose on the dangerous Rock Block Mountain! Calvin launches a Robo Rescue Mission but they keep escaping! Calvin uses his PLAY POWER and calls on a special helper to save them.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S2 Ep203
programme.desc: Paddington throws a Birthday party for Mateo but things don't go to plan, will Mrs. Brown's clown act save the day?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S2 Ep204
programme.desc: It's Mrs. Bird Day and Paddington wants to make a cake with a Special jar of Marmalade but no one can open it - how will he show his appreciation?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S5 Ep513
programme.desc: Doctor Hamster is rushed off her feet when nearly all the animals need her help on the same day.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S5 Ep514
programme.desc: Peppa and George meet Kylie Kangaroo and her brother Joey. Peppa shows Kylie how to jump up and down in muddy puddles, but who can jump the highest?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep121
programme.desc: It is Mummy Pig's birthday, and Peppa, George and Daddy Pig are planning a surprise.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep122
programme.desc: Peppa loses her tooth, so she puts the tooth under the pillow for the Tooth Fairy, but she worries that she might be mean.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S5 Ep508
programme.desc: When Agnes the Dragon moves to the Kingdom of Roses, everyone is afraid of her fearsome roar! Everyone except Zooli, who befriends Agnes and shows her friends how lovable Agnes really is!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S1 Ep113
programme.desc: Before we can read, we need to play Blue's Clues to figure out Blue's favorite story! While looking for clues, we help Shovel and Pail act out 'Jack and Jill' and match the three bears with their belongings.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S1 Ep115
programme.desc: It's Bluestock - the Blue's Clues Music Concert! We figure out what song Blue wants to sing. Blue and Josh are excited to hear all of our musical friends sing including Magenta and Ally Brooke!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S4 Ep415
programme.desc: Blaze and AJ are excited to play with their new friend Roarian, the Flying Lion! But when Roarian loses his magical sunstone, he turns into a statue! It's up to them to find the sunstone to save Roarian!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S1 Ep117
programme.desc: After getting stranded at the bottom of a crevice, Bonnie and Santiago must team up to save the day. // Santiago is on a mad dash to get his compass back after Bonnie Bones and Sir Butterscotch nabbed it.

programme.title: Miss Aaliyah
programme.desc: Aaliyah, gadis yang tidak mempunyai hala tuju dicabar oleh ayahnya untuk mendapatkan pekerjaan.Dia berjaya mendapat kerja sebagai cikgu dan pembantu rumah kepada seorang usahawan.

programme.desc: Program ini dicipta khas untuk merealisasikan impian papa mereka khas untuk Hari Bapa. Anak-anak dapat peluang untuk berkongsi impian papa mereka.

programme.title: Geng Bas Sekolah S4 Ep05
programme.desc: GBS menemui seorang ahli baru bernama Diana setelah Emily bertukar sekolah. Kerana sifatnya yang atletik, berani bersuara dan cantik menyebabkan dia terpilih.

programme.title: Rafeeq Ep11
programme.desc: Rafeeq, askar maya dari abad ke-22 hampir kekurangan kuasa ketika berperang lalu merentas masa bagi mendapatkan pertolongan Profesor Arif. Malangnya, Arif berumur 12 tahun ketika mereka bertemu.

programme.desc: Tanpa sengaja, Yaya menggunakan apron Dr Azrina untuk menyapu air yang tumpah dilantai. Yaya menjahitkan apron baru untuk Dr Azrina dengan menggunakan dress kesayangan Mia.

programme.title: The Shameless
programme.desc: In order to flush out a mob enforcer, homicide detective Jung befriends the suspect's girlfriend, Hye-kyung, only to fall in love with her.

programme.title: Marrying the Mafia 2: Enemy in Law
programme.desc: When In-Jae, the eldest son of a mafia family meets the beautiful Jin-Kyung, his mother is more than pleased but when they find out she is a prosecutor, it brings chaos to their family.

programme.title: Will You Be There?
programme.desc: A surgeon's dying wish is to see his lover who had died in an accident long ago. He receives pills that allow him to travel back in time and tries to save her. There, he also meets his younger self.

programme.title: Fist & Furious
programme.desc: A former detective grants permission to a freelance video journalist to cover his revenge journey on a mob boss whom previously killed his partner during an investigation.

programme.title: We Are Brothers
programme.desc: Two brothers separated at birth reunite 30 years later and go on a road trip in search of their mom with Alzheimer's.

programme.title: Three Sisters
programme.desc: Three sisters reunited for their father's birthday, yet the strange action of their brother reveals their dark past.

programme.title: One Day
programme.desc: A newly widowed insurance examiner takes a case involving a woman who is in a coma. When visits her at the hospital, he encounters her spirit and realizes he is the only person who can see her.

programme.title: Castaway on the Moon
programme.desc: Two lonely social castaways cross paths on a deserted island slowly discover that there may be more to life they initially thought.

programme.title: The Box
programme.desc: A washed-up former hit producer and a young man with stage fear while aspiring to be a singer head off on a road trip filled with music and jamming sessions.

programme.title: The Chronicles of Evil
programme.desc: A detective must untangle past mistakes to figure out why he was targeted at the first place and becomes the murderer of a taxi driver.

programme.title: Deranged
programme.desc: A pharmaceutical salesman races against time to save his family when they start to exhibit symptoms of a fatal outbreak that had been causing an epidemic of drownings.

programme.title: Okay! Madam
programme.desc: A married couple unwittingly become involved in a rescue operation of a hijacked aircraft during their first-ever family trip abroad to Hawaii.

programme.title: Tunnel
programme.desc: While driving home for his daughter's birthday, a man gets trapped in a collapsed tunnel and struggles to survive with just two bottles of water, a birthday cake and a cell phone.

programme.title: Me and Me
programme.desc: When a detective heads to a rural village to investigate the mysterious death of a couple, he finds himself in an inexplicable situation where his life is completely reversed.

programme.title: The Man From Nowhere
programme.desc: A quiet pawnshop keeper with a violent past takes on a drug-and-organ trafficking ring in hope of saving the child who is his only friend.

programme.title: Mission: Possible
programme.desc: A cash-strapped private investigator Woo Su-Han is retained by a secret agent Yoo Da-Hee to bring down a high risk arms trafficking operation.

programme.title: Miss Granny
programme.desc: Complications and hilarity ensues when a 70-year-old woman living unhappily with her son's family is magically restored to her beauty of 50 years earlier.

programme.title: Will You Be There?
programme.desc: A surgeon's dying wish is to see his lover who had died in an accident long ago. He receives pills that allow him to travel back in time and tries to save her. There, he also meets his younger self.

programme.title: I Can Speak
programme.desc: An elderly woman forms an unlikely friendship with a junior civil service officer. After realizing that he is proficient in English, she begs he officer to teach her, for reasons of her own.

programme.title: Marrying the Mafia 2: Enemy in Law
programme.desc: When In-Jae, the eldest son of a mafia family meets the beautiful Jin-Kyung, his mother is more than pleased but when they find out she is a prosecutor, it brings chaos to their family.

programme.title: Tunnel
programme.desc: While driving home for his daughter's birthday, a man gets trapped in a collapsed tunnel and struggles to survive with just two bottles of water, a birthday cake and a cell phone.

programme.title: Peninsula
programme.desc: Set four years after the zombie outbreak, a former soldier and his team return to the zombie-infested wastelands to retrieve a truck of money and try to escape from it alive.

programme.title: The Good, the Bad, the Weird
programme.desc: The story of two outlaws and a bounty hunter in 1930s Manchuria and their rivalry to possess a treasure map while being pursued by the Japanese army and Chinese bandits.

programme.title: Rampant
programme.desc: Returning from imprisonment abroad, a prince and his fellow countrymen band together to battle bloodthirsty demons in ancient Korea.

programme.title: Operation Chromite
programme.desc: 'Operation Chromite' tells the true story of a General, who led the attack against the North Koreans in the Battle of Incheon, forcing them to retreat out of Seoul.
